薍字的基本解释

薍
wàn
初生的荻。

薍
luàn
〔薍子〕小蒜的根。

薍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wàn］
［《廣韻》五患切，去諫，疑。］
初生的荻。
[②]［luàn］
［《集韻》盧玩切，去换，來。］
见“薍2子”。

薍字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薍； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1060第31
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?五患切，音與綰同。【玉篇】菼薍。【陸璣詩疏】薍或謂之荻，至秋堅成則謂之萑。【唐書·竇建德傳】高雞泊廣袤數百里，葭薍阻奧，可以避難。　又【類篇】盧玩切，音亂。【集韻】小蒜根曰薍子。

薍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
薍字的起名意思

暂无。

薍
wàn

薍

薍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wàn］
["Guangyun" five problems cut, go to admonish, doubt. ]
Newborn Di.
[②]［luàn］
["Ji Yun" Lu Wanqie, go for it, come. ]
See "薍2子".
薍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　薍; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1060 31
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Five diseases are cut, the sound is the same as the string. 【Jade articles】Congjiao. 【Lu Ji's Poems】Tiao or Zhi Di, until the autumn is strong, it is called Zhi Di. [Tang Shu·Dou Jiande Biography] Gao Ji Po is vast for hundreds of miles, and Jia Jiao obstructs Austria and can take refuge.　[Classes] Lu Wanqie, the sound is chaotic. 【Jiyun】The root of small garlic is called barley seed.
